meta.summary: Assessment of legal obligations regarding asbestos roofs prior to installation of microwave system in 2027 and need for client-provided asbestos certification.

children.text: Food-industry buildings in Flanders containing asbestos-cement roofs fall under the OVAM Asbestos Abatement Action Plan. While no immediate mandatory removal applies unless the material is damaged or renovation disturbs it, asbestos roofs are targeted for removal by 2034.

Asbestos certificates are mandatory for buildings built before 2001 under certain conditions (e.g., property transfer). Even outside those cases, requesting the certificate is best practice when planning industrial installations.

sections.title: Impact on the 2027 Microwave System Installation

children.text: The planned installation in 2027 may require roof penetrations or structural attachments. Any disturbance of asbestos-cement materials requires compliance with asbestos-handling regulations and may trigger mandatory removal.

children.title: Key Risk Considerations
items: Potential disturbance of asbestos during mechanical installation.
Condition of asbestos roof (cracking, delamination, weathering).
Worker exposure limits and required protective procedures.
Possible need to schedule removal prior to equipment installation.

children.text: To ensure regulatory compliance and safe installation conditions, the client should provide an up-to-date asbestos inventory or asbestos certificate. The certificate must confirm the condition and extent of asbestos-containing materials, and whether removal can be safely postponed until after 2027.

If the installation requires any form of drilling, cutting, or mechanical stress on asbestos-containing roofing panels, professional asbestos removal or encapsulation may be required before work begins.

A client-provided asbestos certificate is required to verify that the asbestos roof is in an acceptable condition and that postponement of removal is permitted under local regulations. This documentation must be obtained before finalizing planning for the 2027 installation.
